content.text:
# 2023 ICC Awards

| award1_type  = Cricketer of the Year
| award1_winner= '''Men's:  Pat CumminsWomen's:'''  Nat Sciver-Brunt
| award2_type  = Men's Test Cricketer of the Year
| award2_winner=  Usman Khawaja
| award3_type  = ODI Cricketer of the Year
| award3_winner= '''Men's:  Virat KohliWomen's:  Chamari Athapaththu
| award4_type  = T20I Cricketer of the Year
| award4_winner= Men's:  Suryakumar Yadav Women's:  Hayley Matthews
| award5_type  = Emerging Cricketer of the Year
| award5_winner= Men's:  Rachin Ravindra Women's:  Phoebe Litchfield
| previous     = 2022
| main         = ICC Awards
| next         = 2024
}}
The 2023 ICC Awards''' were the nineteenth edition of ICC Awards. The nominations took into account players' performance between 1 January 2023 and 31 December 2023.
Winners and nominees
The shortlists of the nominations for individual award categories were announced from 3 to 5 January 2024.
